snippet: The slumping Hunter Mahan was devastated not to be a part of the Ryder Cup, but in November he took a trip to Israel with his wife, Kandi, that he called "eye-opening."
abstract: The slumping Hunter Mahan was devastated not to be a part of the Ryder Cup, but in November he took a trip to Israel with his wife, Kandi, that he called "eye-opening."

headline.main: After Ryder Cup Disappointment, Mahan Gains Perspective
